S

SLOW_START - Static variable in class ch4.tcp.TCPSender
Type of sending mode: Slow start.
SSThresh - Variable in class ch4.tcp.TCPSender
The threshold value at which the slow start sending mode should kick in.
SUCCESS - Static variable in class ch4.tcp.TCPSimulator
Outcome of a previous transmission: success.
send(TCPSegment[], int, boolean) - Method in class ch4.tcp.TCPSender
"Sends" segments by indicating in the array what segments should be sent in this iteration.
send(TCPSegment[], int, boolean) - Method in class ch4.tcp.TCPSenderTahoe
TCP Tahoe implementation of the send() method.
sendMode - Variable in class ch4.tcp.TCPSender
Current sending mode; default value is SLOW_START.
seqNum - Variable in class ch4.tcp.TCPSegment
Sequence number of this segment, which is the sequence number of the first byte of data carried in this segment.
